settings.make-payment-subheading: Pay your bills at any time.
settings.method-subheading: View and edit the way you pay.

policy.title: Policy Wide Coverages
policy.bodily-injury-description: Coverage that provides financial protection for other people’s physical injuries and other related expenses when you cause an accident.
policy.property-damage-description: Covers the cost of damages to other people’s property when you cause an accident.
policy.personal-injury-description: Covers you and your passengers’ medical bills. It also pays for things like lost wages and other nonmedical costs.
policy.uninsured-bodily-injury-description: Covers you and the people in your car for medical bills and related expenses if you're in an accident caused by someone who is uninsured, underinsured, or a hit-and-run.
policy.uninsured-property-damage-description: Covers damages to your car if someone hits you and is uninsured, underinsured, or a hit-and-run.
policy.comprehensive-coverage-description: Covers different types of losses that are usually not the result of driving the vehicle, such as theft, hail or fallen trees, something other than collision.
policy.collision-coverage-description: Pays to repair or replace your car, minus your selected deductible, if it’s damaged in an accident involving another vehicle or an object, such as a tree or a wall.
policy.rental-reimbursement-description: Pays for you to rent a car if yours is stolen or being repaired after an accident where a claim has been filed.

claim.intro_notice: Claims are typically filed in just 7 minutes or less.
claim.question_1_help: Tell us more about how you feel
claim.question_11: Did police respond to the scene?
claim.question_12: Was an ambulance called to the scene?
claim.question_13: Were you transporting any hazardous materials?
claim.question_14: Was there any physical property damaged from the accident?
claim.question_15: Is there damage to the insured’s vehicle?
claim.question_17: Is there damage to any other vehicles or property?
claim.details_information_1: Please give us more information about the incident
claim.success-heading: We’ll get you back on the road in no time.
claim.success-subheading: Please check your email over the next 12 hours. One of our super friendly customer care reps will be in touch with next steps, if any.

walkthrough.driving-text: We'll deliver real-time feedback and help you understand, improve, and share your drive.
walkthrough.roads-text: Find the safest and quickest route to get to where you're going.
walkthrough.claims-text: File claims, upload photos, and connect with our Care Team in a few taps.
walkthrough.do-good-text: We reinvest our profits back into the community - and we couldn't do it with you. Thanks for riding with LOOP.
walkthrough.all-set-text: Be sure to have the app turned on so you can get the most out of LOOP. See you on the road.

policy-wide.bodily-injury-info: Coverage that provides financial protection for other people's physical injuries and other related expenses when you cause an accident.
policy-wide.property-damage-info: Covers the cost of damages to other people's property when you cause an accident.
policy-wide.personal-injury-info: Covers you and your passengers' medical bills. It also pays for things like lost wages and other nonmedical costs.
policy-wide.uninsured-motorist-info: Covers you and the people in your car for medical bills and related expenses if you're in an accident caused by someone who is uninsured, underinsured, or a hit-and-run.
policy-wide.uninsured-property-info: Covers damages to your car if someone hits you and is uninsured, underinsured, or a hit-and-run.

vehicle-coverage.comprehensive-info: Covers different types of losses that are usually not the result of driving the vehicle, such as theft, hail or fallen trees, something other than collision.
vehicle-coverage.collision-info: Pays to repair or replace your car, minus your selected deductible, if it’s damaged in an accident involving another vehicle or an object, such as a tree or a wall.
vehicle-coverage.rental-info: Pays for you to rent a car if yours is stolen or being repaired after an accident where a claim has been filed.
vehicle-coverage.roadside-info: Roadside assistance helps you when your vehicle breaks down to get your car back to driving condition.
vehicle-coverage.full-coverage-info: This is required for leased/financed vehicles

coverage-modal.injury-info: If selected, we will automatically apply the limit you chose for Bodily Injury.
coverage-modal.property-info: If selected, we will automatically apply the limit you chose for Property Damage, and UM/UIM BI will be added. This includes a $250 deductible.
coverage-modal.rental-info: Covers a maximum limit of 30 days on rental reimbursement. To select this coverage, Comprehensive and Collision is required.

payment-plan.choose-plan: Choose a payment plan that suits you and save!

vehicle-info.full-coverage-info: Typically, loaned or leased vehicles require more coverage.

permissions.location-heading: We need you to have location on
permissions.location-subheading: You’ll need to enable your location in order to use LOOP.  We provide insights on your driving, helping you control your premium rating!
permissions.settings-message: This step allows Sample to find the best auto insurance based on your insane driving habits... Slow down Mad Max
permissions.location_primer_prompt: For the best experience, turn on location services. Turn on now?
permissions.location_primer_prompt_restriced: To use your location, the phone administrator needs to enable location services in Settings > General > Restrictions > Location Services.
permissions.search_location_deny_prompt: Sample needs your location to display items nearby.
permissions.search_location_never_ask_again_prompt: To see items nearby, Charlotte needs your location. Please turn on location access in your settings.
permissions.post_location_deny_prompt: Sample needs you location to post your item locally.
permissions.post_location_never_ask_again_prompt: To post your item locally, Charlotte needs your location. Please turn on location access in your settings.
permissions.meetup_location_deny_prompt: Location access is required to use this feature. Would you like to enable it now?
permissions.meetup_location_never_ask_again_prompt: Location access is required to use this feature. Please turn on location access in your settings.
permissions.user_location_deny_prompt: Location access is required to get your current location. Would you like to enable it now?
permissions.user_location_never_ask_again_prompt: Location access is required for us to get you the best damn rates. Please turn on location access in your settings.
